participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, Emily is always looking for ways to express herself through music.
participant_1.background: I grew up in a small town in the Midwest, but I'm ready for a change. I'm dissatisfied with the school life I've had so far. I enjoy skiing. I'm proud to have a happy and healthy relationship with my partner. Music is an important part of my life, and I love to listen to it when I'm working, relaxing, or just hanging out.

participant_2.name: Michael Thompson
participant_2.personality: Practical and hardworking, Michael is dedicated to his work and enjoys spending time with his family.
participant_2.background: I went on a family road trip across the country with my sons in my minivan. I’m excited to start my new internship and learn more about construction. I'm taking online classes. I listen to music for more than 5 hours a day. My favorite thing to do on the weekends is to wear my band t-shirts and relax by watching foreign films.

content.text: Hey, not much, just getting ready to go to work.
What do you do for work?
I'm in construction, so I'm going to a worksite today.
Oh cool, I'm in school right now. I'm a little dissatisfied with the school life I've had so far, but I'm hoping it gets better.
I'm studying music composition. I love music and I'm really passionate about it, but I'm not sure what I want to do with it after I graduate.
I see. Well, I'm sure you'll figure it out. Music is a great field to be in, there are so many opportunities out there.
Thanks, I hope so. What's your favorite thing about construction?
I like the challenge of it. It's always different, and I like that I'm always learning new things.
That's awesome. I'm sure you're really good at it.
Well, I'm sure you're going to have a great day at work.
